default.title: Case Overview
default.content: Track case progress, manage deadlines, and coordinate with team members on case activities. The case overview provides a comprehensive view of all case elements including timeline, documents, tasks, and team assignments.

timeline-management.title: Case Timeline
timeline-management.content: Manage important dates, deadlines, and milestones throughout the case lifecycle. Set up automatic reminders and track SLA compliance.

team-coordination.title: Team Coordination
team-coordination.content: Assign team members to cases, delegate tasks, and track individual contributions. Ensure proper communication and accountability.

status-tracking.title: Status Tracking
status-tracking.content: Monitor case progress through defined stages from intake to resolution. Update status to reflect current case activities and milestones.
